entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the evening. Rain mixed with wet snow before morning. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
